column4: ive not used  the squid caching proxy in ages... last i used it.. it was rather trivial to get going.. install it. set the browser proxy to use it..
i never used any password options when i setup squid.
check the linuxprinting.org site and cups.org site to see how well any printers you may like are supported. and the vararius reviews of any printers.
i can suggest 'avoid canon' - they have bad rep. for linux sypport.
